      • ClientHandler

        view - View to print communication messages on

    • Method Detail

      • setParentServer

        public void setParentServer(Server serverToSet)
        Sets the Server field to this server, so handleDisconnect() can notify the server. Supposed to be set to null when a game takes over.
        Parameters:
        serverToSet - A Server

      • setParentGame

        public void setParentGame(Game gameToSet)
        Sets the Game field to this server, so handleDisconnect() can notify the game. Supposed to be set to null until a game takes over.
        Parameters:
        gameToSet -

      • sendMessage

        Send a message to the client connected through this handler's socket.
        Parameters:

      • run

        public void run()
        Run method for listening in a separate thread.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • handleMessage

        private void handleMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Method to handle a received message. SENDCAPABILITES is only processed when the server and game fields are not set, i.e. when this client has no player associated with it on the Server and is not part of a game. MAKEMOVE is only processed if a game has been started with this client and the game expects input from this client. Any invalid messages result in a call to bullshitReceived().
        Parameters:
        message - A message

      • bullshitReceived

        public void bullshitReceived()
        Keeps track of bullshit received. Increases bullshit counter and evaluates if it exceeds the threshold, if so, this client is dropped.

      • handleDisconnect

        private void handleDisconnect()
        Responds to a disconnect or communication failure, shuts down this handler and informs parent game or server, if set.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Shuts down this handler. This is supposed to happen when everything goes according to plan.

      • printReceivedMessage

        private void printReceivedMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Prints a message on the view, with the annotation that it was received and timestamp.
        Parameters:
        message -

      • printSentMessage

        private void printSentMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Prints a message on the view, with the annotation that it was send and timestamp.
        Parameters:
        message -

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Provides a textual description of the connection to the client.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • argToBool

        private static boolean argToBool(java.lang.String s)
        Checks if a String matched "1", if so return true, else false. Supposed to be called only when the String equals "1" or "0".
        Parameters:
        s - A String equaling "1" or "0".
        Returns:
        s.equals("1);
